jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining the frontend of web applications. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js is required.

applications.name: Alice Smith
applications.coverLetter: I am very interested in this position and have 3 years of experience in frontend development.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Looking for an experienced backend developer with a strong understanding of REST APIs, databases, and server-side programming using Node.js.

applications.name: Bob Johnson
applications.coverLetter: With 5 years of backend experience, I am skilled in Node.js and database management.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Seeking a data scientist proficient in data analysis, machine learning, and Python. Experience with TensorFlow and Pandas is a plus.
